title: gauloises \>blondes
content:
hi there!

i’m searching for the gauloises font, used for the “BLONDES”. hope you can help me.

here’s a link, i search the orange one.

[http://perso.wanadoo.fr/screp/gauloise.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119154606/http:/perso.wanadoo.fr/screp/gauloise.jpg "http://perso.wanadoo.fr/screp/gauloise.jpg")

thanks and greets,

seraphim

 [‹ DutchMaster ? Where to find](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119154606/http:/typophile.com/node/15156 "Go to previous forum topic") ["TransCal" 50s script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119154606/http:/typophile.com/node/1637 "Go to next forum topic")
author: seraphim

comments.content:
Judging by the uneven x height I doubt this is a font.  
Tim
